newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria places 3.63 bln levs of 9-mth T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria places 3.63 bln levs of 9-mth T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry placed on Wednesday a special issue of 3.63 billion levs worth of nine-month floater coupon T-bills, yielding 180.42 percent, the Bulgarian National Bank (BNB) said.
The coupon of the issue was set equal to the BNB's central interest rate (CIR) for the periods to maturity. The CIR is now set at an annual 108 percent.
The BNB, in line with its usual practice, did not say with which financial institution or institutions the paper has been placed.
Cumulative annual yield 180.42 percent -- Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-84561
